column1: The T3RU test measures the level of proteins that carry thyroid hormone in the blood.
Your health care provider will tell you if you need to stop taking medicines that may affect the test result.
TBG is a protein that carries most of the T3 and T4 in the blood.
Your doctor may order this test if you have signs of a thyroid disorder, including: - Hyperthyroidism - Hypothyroidism - Thyrotoxic periodic paralysis
